title: Stowe Vermont Labor Day SOORTA just announced! Book your campsite for SOORTA Bentonville now (details below)!

events.name: Soorta Bentonville
events.description: RV & Camping reservations can be made by contacting the RV park directly by clicking this link! Please tell them that you are part of the SOORTA weekend group, as we have a block of sites set aside for the event. Join other Tandem Mountain Bike enthusiasts as we experience Bentonville's many great mtb trail systems!

events.name: Bike the Brek!
events.description: Building on the success of Pedal the Butte, teams Hollansworth, Rudolph and Judds are very pleased to announce yet another Colorado SOORTA extravaganza!

events.name: Soorta Sizzler
events.description: Ride your tandem bike on some fun (shaded) trails and hang out on a beautiful Florida beach!

events.name: Stowe Vermont Labor Day Weekend
events.description: There are fast, flowy and technical trails. There will be rocks, roots and you will climb. BUT they are fun and the area is beautiful. This event will be two weeks before ETOR (you don't want to miss that).

events.name: ETOR 2019 Kingdom Trails
events.description: ETOR 2019 will be at Kingdom Trails in East Burke, VT with the host lodging at Moose River Campground in nearby St. Johnsbury, VT.

events.name: SOORTA TdF 2020
events.description: Come join us in Alachua, Florida next January for the 2020 Tour de Felasco!  We usually have a good turnout of tandems, so letâ€™s get a campsite and turn it into a SOORTA event!  Registration for the Tour opens October 1st 2019.

events.name: SOORTA TdF 2020
events.description: Lets SOORTA the SBA Ididaride 50 mile event once again!
